summary: Believe it or not even in Smalltown USA there are still people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna and Lamar could have the perfect relationship if it were not Lamar's obsession with rear entry.
cast: Kitten Natividad|Ann Marie|Ken Kerr|June Mack|Patrick Wright|Henry Rowland|Robert E. Pearson|Michael Finn|Sharon Hill|Don Scarborough|Aram Katcher|DeForest Covan|Steve Tracy|Uschi Digard|Stuart Lancaster|Candy Samples|John Furlong|Russ Meyer
title: Más allá del valle de las ultravixens
